channel.title: Umm, removing dueling? (Dodian source) help :P!?!?
channel.description:
Well...I'm using Dodian source but dueling is pretty useless and its easy to dupe with it,
With that source, I can temporary disable dueling but after server restarts, you can duel again. I wanna make it so that it is disabled even after server restarts..But I still wanna have a chance to restore it back if I needed to. I dont wanna remove the dueling code completely. So I need help. Yeah, help me :D
I'm not much of a coder but I wanna run the server :P

item.title: Umm, removing dueling? (Dodian source) help :P!?!?
item.dc:creator: @SonGoku SonGoku
item.description:
@SonGoku wrote:

Wow your a help pklobby. Acaully read his question.

P K, go to server.java, and find dueling = true; and change that to dueling = false;

Read full topic

item.title: Umm, removing dueling? (Dodian source) help :P!?!?
item.dc:creator: @pklobbys pklobbys
item.description:
@pklobbys wrote:

You’re a fucking dumbass…I love seeing little kids “omg sum1 duped”…
Just search for “Duel with” in client.java and remove it.

Read full topic
